Hero.titleEnd: and prepare for an Ausbildung team in 2026.
Hero.subtitle: Through self-study and AI-assisted practice, I build solid fundamentals, implement small to medium features and improve my skills continuously.
points: Mobile-first implementation for recruiters on smartphones
Clear information structure over visual noise
First experience with React, Next.js and API integration
Learning with feedback, documentation and AI tools
Hero.panelText: I am looking for an Ausbildung position where I can contribute as a junior, learn from experienced developers and grow step by step.

About.title: About me
About.lead: I bring initiative, learning mindset and first project practice — a solid base for starting an Ausbildung.
paragraphs: My path into development started with curiosity: I wanted to understand how strong digital products are built and why some interfaces feel intuitive from the first second.
To improve consistently, I built a structured learning routine with regular coding sessions, small learning goals and trackable progress.

Right now I work on smaller frontend tasks and actively use AI tools to research, test and implement solutions faster. For 2026, I am looking for an Ausbildung team where I can grow this foundation professionally.

highlights.label: Initiative
highlights.value: I learn continuously in self-study and apply new knowledge directly in small projects.

highlights.label: Learning focus
highlights.value: I work step by step on fundamentals in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React.

highlights.label: AI-assisted workflow
highlights.value: I use Claude and ChatGPT for research, prototyping and debugging.

highlights.label: 2026 goal
highlights.value: Grow in a team, gain practical experience and contribute reliably.

About.motivationTitle: What I bring into an Ausbildung role
motivationPoints: I learn quickly and translate feedback into better technical solutions immediately.
I work reliably within clear structures while staying focused on user impact.
I am looking for a team where I can learn from experienced engineers and contribute productively early.

profile.name: Oleksandr Shevchenko
profile.caption: I combine disciplined self-learning with AI-assisted practice and build my technical foundation step by step.
facts: Languages: German B1 (actively improving to B2) · English A2 (actively improving)
Focus: HTML/CSS, JavaScript fundamentals, first projects with React and Next.js

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.intro: Four practical projects that address real everyday needs and show my current working style.

items.title: AI Application Assistant
items.summary: Analyzes job posts and drafts personalized cover letters with editable export.

items.title: Rent Price Tracker
items.summary: Compares rent costs across German cities with trend charts and income calculator.

items.title: SmartChat
items.summary: Advanced AI chat with streaming answers, history, markdown and code highlighting.

items.title: DevDash
items.summary: Customizable developer dashboard with widgets, Pomodoro and GitHub activity.

Resume.title: Resume
Resume.intro: My path into software development is practical and clearly structured: disciplined self-learning with AI support, real projects and a concrete Ausbildung target for 2026.

timeline.title: Structured Self-Learning in Frontend with AI Support
timeline.text: Regular coding sessions, documented learning goals and continuous learning with support from AI tools.

timeline.title: Project Delivery with AI Support
timeline.text: Planned and built multiple demo projects with AI support instead of tutorial-only clones. Focus on understandable UI and functional prototypes.

timeline.title: Ausbildung in Software Development
timeline.text: Join an Ausbildung team to combine practical experience with professional development processes, teamwork and accountable product delivery.

Resume.closingTitle: What a team can expect from me
Resume.closingText: I work in a structured way, learn quickly and speak openly about my current level. My goal is to contribute reliably in a team and keep improving.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: I am open to conversations about Ausbildung roles, internships or trial work in software development.
Contact.linksIntro: For a fast response, feel free to reach out via email or my public profiles.

availability.title: Availability
availability.text: Actively looking for an Ausbildung position starting in 2026 and open to internships, trial days or intro conversations.
